To the anon boosting numbers: bring a source which claims 750 million, and this may be included. Might I remind you that I'm biased toward this article, and yet I still object to the unsourced number.
This is not a list of all Orthodox churches, just those most known to English speakers; also removed "continuation," since the EOC regards itself as the Church, not just a "continuation" of it.

"One Holy Catholic and Apostolic Church" is never used in this article to refer to the Eastern Orthodox Church; and Catholic is always used in this article to refer to the Roman Catholic Church

unclear why this paragraph was removed without comment
/* Bible, holy tradition, and the patristic consensus */
This is not only an incorrect use of "viz.," it adds clutter.
/* Icons */ Removing sentence on stylistic grounds; "Russian Orthodox icons are treated in separate articles"; but other Orthodox articles aren't? also use of self-referential voice is unencyclopedic
/* Eschatology */ Demoting section to level 3 under "Beliefs"; why does this section merit its own section?
